General.Name: Guangzhou Sanfu New Materials Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guangzhou Sanfu New Materials Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of new environmentally friendly surface engineering special chemicals in China. The company offers electronic and electroplating chemicals. It serves PCB, communication electronics, bathroom hardware, and auto parts industries. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 57, Phoenix Sanheng Road, Guangzhou, China, 510663
